name: Blox 2
overview: BLOX 2 contains many new features, levels, languages and graphical updates compared to its predecessor. With over 1800 levels, BLOX 2 is one of the largest Virtual Boy homebrews. The levels from the original game are also available by entering a cheat code. BLOX 2 also includes “Multiblox” levels where two players work together to solve a level, each controlled by one of the directional pads. This game plays in nine different languages: English, German, Spanish, Swedish, French, Italian, Slovenian, Finnish and Czech. The original cartridge supported saves via internal battery.
